page.title: 07My Weekend - Linda
page.content: Last weekend I went to the shops with Mum and Dad and we went to Corsham and then we went to the town in Chippenham. We went in Woolworths and I bought a book and a tape. The tape has the story of Sleeping Beauty on it and the book has the same story. You can read along with the tape. I went out to play with my friends and then had my tea. On Sunday my Dad and I went to the shop and I had 50p to spend. Then we went home and I played with my friends. At home I played with my sister and my cat. Then I was called to have my dinner so me and my Mum and my Dad and my sister had our dinner. Afterwards me and my sister watched Tom and Jerry on the television.
